title: Someone is playing on my account right now.
body: There is someone playing fiora top that is not me. I have changed my password after it changed on its own.... And now someone is playing on my account.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your account may be compromised. I **strongly recommend** changing the password for the email address tied to your account, then submit an [**account recovery ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so we can assist you in sorting this our ASAP.

If you have any questions, let me know.
The person is stilling playing on my account. Is there anything, anyone can do?
you gotta send a ticket, and wait for them to fix the problem
